alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued March 18 at 3:46AM CDT until March 19 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 9 AM CDT SUNDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning tonight, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 expected. For the Freeze Watch Sunday night, sub- freezing temperatures as low as 26 possible. * WHERE...In Alabama, Choctaw, Washington, Clarke, Wilcox, Monroe, Conecuh, Butler and Crenshaw Counties. In Mississippi, Wayne County. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 4 AM to 9 AM CDT Sunday. For the Freeze Watch, from late Sunday night through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
